section.title: Fixpoint operator (rec)
section.para: Another way to define recursion is using the fixpoint operator rec x(s), which recurses on applications of x within s.

Originally, the rec operator was the only way to define recursion. It is still in the language in the first place because it is widely used in many existing programs, and in the second place because it can be a nice concise expression of a recursive strategy.
